name: Beautifully Unambiguous Long-Lasting Effervescent Tournament: Humongous Explosions Locked and Loaded
name_original: Beautifully Unambiguous Long-Lasting Effervescent Tournament: Humongous Explosions Locked and Loaded
description:
BULLETHELL is a 2-player competitive bullet-hell game where everyone plays as a final boss character. Your ships are gargantuan, and your weapons are ridiculously overpowered. Use your insane firepower to annihilate your opponent before they reduce you to space rubble!

Choose from 5 unique ships, each with different weapon loadouts and strategies to achieve victory!
